name: castrated
content:

(of a male animal or human) having had the testicles (= the two round male sex organs that produce sperm) removed: The field contained forty-four castrated male lambs. You did not say whether your dog is castrated. Compare
altered
neutered
spayed
More examplesFewer examplesThe castrated animal becomes docile and easily manageable.An ox used as a draught animal is often an adult, castrated male. The fair's hog show only allows castrated male hogs.A capon is a castrated rooster that is prized for its delicate taste and texture.The police horses are all gelded (castrated).
